batchCreateHats(uint256[],string[],uint3.details: All hats must be in the same tree

returns._0: True if all hats were created

params._hatIds: Array of hat IDs to mint
params._wearers: Array of addresses to mint to

changeHatDetails(uint256,string).details: Only callable by admin of mutable hat

changeHatEligibility(uint256,address).details: Only callable by admin of mutable hat

changeHatImageURI(uint256,string).details: Only callable by admin of mutable hat

changeHatMaxSupply(uint256,uint32).details: Only callable by admin of mutable hat. Cannot reduce below current supply.

changeHatToggle(uint256,address).details: Only callable by admin of mutable hat

checkHatStatus(uint256).details: Triggers toggle check and emits events

checkHatWearerStatus(uint256,address).details: Triggers eligibility check and emits events

createHat(uint256,string,uint32,address,.details: Caller must be an admin of _admin

params._admin: The admin hat ID for the new hat

returns.newHatId: The ID of the created hat

params._level: The level to get admin at (0 = top hat)

returns._0: The admin hat ID at that level
The next available child hat ID
True if the hat is active
True if the address is an admin
True if the hat is a top hat

isWearerOfHat(address,uint256).details: Returns true if:   1. Account holds a balance of the hat's token   2. The hat is active   3. The account is eligible to wear the hat

returns._0: True if the account is wearing the hat

mintHat(uint256,address).details: Caller must be an admin of the hat

mintTopHat(address,string,string).details: Creates a new hat tree with the target as the top hat wearer

params._target: The account to mint the top hat to

returns.topHatId: The ID of the created top hat

setHatWearerStatus(uint256,address,bool,.details: Only callable by the hat's eligibility module

params._standing: Whether the wearer is in good standing

params._inStanding: Whether the wearer is in good standing

params._isWearer: Whether the address is wearing the hat

transferHat(uint256,address,address).details: Caller must be an admin of the hat. Only mutable hats can be transferred.

returns.lastHatId: The last child hat ID created

batchMintHats(uint256[],address[]).notice: Batch mint hats to multiple wearers

batchSetWearers(uint256,address[],bool[].notice: Batch set wearers for a hat (test helper)

checkHatStatus(uint256).notice: Check and update a hat's status

checkHatWearerStatus(uint256,address).notice: Check and update a wearer's status

getAdminAtLevel(uint256,uint32).notice: Get the admin hat ID at a specific level

getHatImageUri(uint256).notice: Get the image URI for a hat

getHatLevel(uint256).notice: Get a hat's level in the tree (0 = top hat)

getNextId(uint256).notice: Get next child hat ID for a parent

isActive(uint256).notice: Check if a hat is active

isAdminOfHat(address,uint256).notice: Check if an address is an admin of a hat

isTopHat(uint256).notice: Check if hat is a top hat

isWearerOfHat(address,uint256).notice: Check if an account is wearing a hat

mintHat(uint256,address).notice: Mint a hat to an account

mintTopHat(address,string,string).notice: Mint a top hat to an account

setHatActive(uint256,bool).notice: Set whether a hat is active (test helper)

setWearer(uint256,address,bool).notice: Set whether an address is wearing a hat (test helper)

transferHat(uint256,address,address).notice: Transfer a hat from one account to another
